item.title: Changing XP rates for combat? 317 deltascape
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“hippo429, post:3, topic:345497”]so if i understood correctly that the 500 would be the amount of xp if you hit a 1?[/quote]Yes if you hit a one you would get 500 xp

item.title: Changing XP rates for combat? 317 deltascape
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Search this in client.java TotalExp = (double) Then look for something that looks like this TotalExp = (double)(500*hitDiff); and then change the 500 to the exp amount you want. Just keep on Searching that until there all changed. But keep in mind some of them are for controlled and Hitpoint’s So read the code under it.

Read full topic
